thread.title: One man injured in shooting near Kent State campus
thread.title_full: One man injured in shooting near Kent State campus | cleveland.com

author: Evan MacDonald, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: One man injured in shooting near Kent State campus
text:
KENT, Ohio -- One man was injured in a shooting early Saturday near the Kent State University campus.
It happened just after 2 a.m. near the intersection of East Main Street and Depeyster Street. The intersection is several blocks away from the campus.
Kent Fire Department paramedics took the man to a nearby hospital. His condition is unknown, police said.
No arrests have been made.
The shooting prompted officials to release an alert to the Kent State community.
"Although this occurred off campus, if you are in the downtown area, take shelter in a safe place," the alert said.
Kent police are investigating.
